A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: IF YOU DIDN'T LIKE IT THE FIRST TIME\, WATCH IT AGAIN. Very good movie. However\, the first time I watched it\, I was very disappointed. I had expected it to feel like the Force Awakens more than other did\, which allowed some of the weird parts to bother me more than they should have. I liked all of the main plot choices\, but didn't like the movie as a whole too much. But\, I calmed down and decided to watch it again. This time\, I knew to expect the different feel of the movie and went in again optimistically. It was so much better! The 2 stars I originally gave it on Rotten Tomatoes became 4 stars. Although I already liked all of the main plot points and big reveals the first time\, I appreciated them more as I let them decide how much I liked the movie. Sure\, I still felt that the Canto Bight scenes felt unimportant\, that Rose's character didn't belong in a saga film (even though I liked her)\, that Finn became a pretty flat character\, and that the odd scene with Leia did not make sense. But\, these are more minor disappointments. The movie was well done. I recommend it! Force Awakens was still my favorite though :)
